p: To verify the results of GeNorm, NormFinder and BestKeeper software, we also used Reffinder tool to generate a comprehensive ranking. As shown in Fig. 3, β-TUB was the most stable reference gene for all samples, while ACT11 was identified as the most unstable (Fig. 3a). When considering different tissues and abiotic stress treatments, β-TUB was confirmed as the most appropriate gene (Fig. 3b, c) were confirmed as the least stable, respectively. For hormone treatments, ACT7 was regarded as the most appropriate reference gene (Fig. 3d).
